attributes.action: Treat the British People like you do the asylem seekers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For instance why do they recieve more benefits.? when do they get houses quicker? there are alot of british people strugling to cope but yet asylem seekers come here straight house and benefits within a couple of weeks ?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
